entry.title: $2080 // Laundry Central A/C S/S Appliances Nostrand ave Crown Heights
entry.content:
Crown Heights, Brooklyn.

Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Nostrand Av, Park Pl. Beautiful and Spacious!!! This brand new 2 bedroom apartment features a modern modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone countertops ! Hardwood floors and Rooms are really big...! Laundry in the basement!! come check it out cause it wont last! Net rent advertised
